params.name: image_url
params.description: URL from which to download a tarball of this environment.

name: Edit a pre-receive environment
description: If you attempt to modify the default environment, you will get a response like this:

params.name: image_url
params.description: URL from which to download a tarball of this environment.

name: Delete a pre-receive environment
description:
If you attempt to delete an environment that cannot be deleted, you will get a response like this:

The possible error messages are:

*   _Cannot modify or delete the default environment_
*   _Cannot delete environment that has hooks_
*   _Cannot delete environment when download is in progress_

name: Get a pre-receive environment's download status
description:
In addition to seeing the download status at the `/admin/pre-receive-environments/:id`, there is also a separate endpoint for just the status.

**Object attributes**

Possible values for `state` are `not_started`, `in_progress`, `success`, `failed`.

params.name: state
params.description: The state of the most recent download.

params.name: downloaded_at
params.description: The time when the most recent download started.

params.name: message
params.description: On failure, this will have any error messages produced.

name: Trigger a pre-receive environment download
description:
Triggers a new download of the environment tarball from the environment's `image_url`. When the download is finished, the newly downloaded tarball will overwrite the existing environment.

If a download cannot be triggered, you will get a reponse like this:

The possible error messages are:

*   _Cannot modify or delete the default environment_
*   _Can not start a new download when a download is in progress_
